description.en: The course provides an overview of the fundamentals of self-management and teaches practical skills in the following areas: setting development tasks and aiming for action, finding and overcoming personal constraints in professional development, analysing and planning personal professional development, using time efficiently, managing emotions, coping with stress and preventing burnout.
description.et: Kursus annab ülevaate enesejuhtimise põhialustest ning võimaldab saada praktilised oskused järgmistes valdkondades: arenguülesannete seadmine ja oma tegevuse eesmärgistamine, isiklike piirangute leidmine ja ületamine erialases arengus, isikliku professionaalse arengu analüüsimine ja planeerimine, tõhus ajakasutus, emotsioonide juhtimine, stressiga toimetulek ja läbipõlemise ennetamine.

objectives.en: The course aims at supporting the self-guided learning and development process of students by helping them to become aware of their personal resources and limitations in the fields related to learning and professional development, also by developing self-regulation and time-management skills.
objectives.et: Toetada õppijate enesejuhitud õppimis- ja arenguprotsessi, aidates neil teadvustada oma isiklikke ressursse ja piiranguid õppimise ning erialase arenguga seotud valdkondades, arendades ka eneseregulatsiooni ja ajakasutuse oskusi.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) analyse their responsibility in the learning process;
2) analyse their strengths and limitations as learners and rely on them in the learning process and in professional development;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) analüüsib oma tugevusi ja piiranguid õppijana ning toetub neile õppimisprotsessis ja erialases arengus;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) analyse their use of time in the learning process;
4) know the symptoms of stress and ways of preventing stress;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) teab stressi sümptomeid ja stressi ennetamise viise;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) create opportunities to cope with internal and external factors affecting the learning process;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) loob võimalusi õppimisprotsessi mõjutavate sisemiste ja väliste teguritega toime tulemiseks;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) instruct group work, conduct a seminar, and receive and provide feedback on the teaching process;
learning_outcomes.et: 6) juhendab rühmatööd, viib läbi seminari ja saab ning annab tagasisidet õpetamisprotsessile;

learning_outcomes.en: 7)  set themselves objectives and motivate themselves to overcome the obstacles to achieving their objectives.
learning_outcomes.et: 7) seab enesele eesmärke ja motiveerib ennast, et ületada takistusi eesmärkide saavutamisel.
